alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hoyle, Burbidge & Narlikar, A Different Approach to Cosmology, p.326-327

"This most remarkable discovery due to Tifft has been totally ignored by the cosmological community. In more than 20 years no one has ever been invited to talk about these data at any of the innumerable cosmological conferences devoted to conventional cosmology."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hoyle on the Cosmological Community Ignoring Quantized Redshift
